front.title: Extensions to the Path Computation Element Communication Protocol for Traffic Engineering Label Switched Paths in SDH Networks

abstract.t: [GMPLS-REQ] describes functional requirements for Generalized Multi- Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) application of Path Computation Element (PCE). This document explains the application-specific extensions for the Path Computation Element Communication Protocol (PCEP) to support SDH. PCEP is the communication protocol defined by IETF in RFC5440. zhang Expires July 2010 [page 1] draft-zhang-pce-pcep-extensions-for-sdh-00.txt January 2010
